Posts.Content: Hi there, I had the same problem with mouth ulcers and metallic taste. My GP prescribed Gelclair and it started to work after 24hrs. I was given nystatin which did nothing for me.  I found that drinking peppermint tea also helped with the metallic taste.  All worth a try. Xx
Posts.Title: VERY SORE MOUTH ULCERS ON SIDE OF TONGUE
